name: NMP and the PogO Invasion
description:
• Defeat waves of PogO enemies.

  • Ally and permanent upgrade cards available to select after each level.

  • Allies: Greek, Soda, Malena, Black Charizard, Kevin & Buddy
  • Allies have special abilities which you control with number keys.

  • Everything resets when you run out of lives.

  • Can you beat all 15 levels to see the ending, Nicholas?

  • twitch name: jackbrux

  • I have tried to ensure the music is DMCA free! The sounds are either CC0 or from Nick's stream.
